text: What a beautiful waterfront area! You can see the cable cars to Sentosa, cruise lines at the Harbour front center, and the Sentosa express monorail going to and fro Sentosa rail.  Sunset is beautiful to watch from here.

The waterfront area of VivoCity mall that oversee the Sentosa. Visitors may also enjoy the Batam-Singapore ferries moving around at Harbourfront as well as pedestrians walking along Sentosa Getaway bridge. It is a good place to sit and enjoy the afternoon sea view from here. There are some F&B eateries available here.

Harbourfront Promenade can be reached from VivoCity mall lobby level. Just walk straight from the lobby towards the seaside promenade.

⛴️A scenic waterfront promenade located behind VivoCity overlooking Sentosa Island.
⛴️A great place for an evening stroll, especially after a sumptuous meal at VivoCity.
⛴️HarbourFront Promenade was once a wharf where ships moored. Several bollards are still around.
⛴️At that time, there was no land bridge linking to Sentosa Island. Only way to get to the Island was to take a ferry across.
Waste of a beautiful setup, they should consider hosting more night market events here to jazz up the vibe which would benefit the restaurants lined up facing the harbour/sentosa
